qas.question: How many Oscar nominations did 'Bridge of Spies' get?
Who played Donovan in 'Bridge of Spies'?

answers.text: New York City, Berlin and Wroclaw, Poland

qas.question: Who played Gary Powers in Bridge of Spies?
Where was most of Bridge of Spies shot?
How many times has Spielberg won Best Director?
How many times has Tom Hanks been nominated for Best Actor?
How many movies has Tom Hanks been in that have won Best Picture?

context: Spielberg directed 2015's Bridge of Spies, a Cold War thriller based on the <a2_0>1960<a2_0/> U-2 incident, and focusing on James B. Donovan's negotiations with the Soviets for the release of pilot Gary Powers after his aircraft was shot down over Soviet territory. The film starred <a3_0>Tom Hanks<a3_0/> as Donovan, as well as <b5_0>Mark Rylance<b5_0/>, Amy Ryan, and Alan Alda, with a script by the Coen brothers. The film was shot from September to December 2014 on location in <a4_0>New York City, <b6_0>Berlin<b6_0/> and Wroclaw, Poland<a4_0/> (which doubled for East Berlin), and was released by Disney on <a0_0>October 16, 2015<a0_0/>. Bridge of Spies received positive reviews from critics, and was nominated for <a1_0><b7_0><b8_0><b9_0>six<b9_0/><b8_0/><b7_0/><a1_0/> Academy Awards, including Best Picture.
